item.title: 印度太阳能光伏组件制造商 Emmvee 申请 IPO
item.description: Emmvee Photovoltaic Power 公司已向印度市场监管机构提交了招股说明书草案，寻求通过首次公开发行募集资金。【原文：Emmvee Photovoltaic Power has submitted a draft prospectus with India’s markets regulator seeking to raise funds via an initial public offering.】

item.title: 法国公司寻求在马来西亚投资 9.47 亿美元
item.description: 据马来西亚投资、贸易和工业部称，由总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）率领的贸易代表团周五在法国与 40 位行业代表会面后，多家法国公司寻求在马来西亚投资共计 40 亿林吉特（约合 9.47 亿美元）。【原文：Several French companies seek to invest a total of 4 billion ringgit ($947 million) in Malaysia after a trade delegation led by Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim met with 40 industry representatives in France on Friday, according to Malaysia’s Ministry of Investment, Trade and Industry.】

item.title: 丹娜斯逼近，台湾发布海陆台风警报
item.description: 台风 "达纳斯 "预计将带来强风和暴雨，台湾当局向全岛发布了陆地和海上警报。【原文：Taiwanese authorities issued a land and sea warning for the entire island as Typhoon Danas is expected to bring strong winds and rain.】

item.title: 关税逼近，韩国寻求延长美国贸易期限
item.description: 韩国和美国贸易官员讨论了延长 7 月 9 日贸易协议最后期限的问题，以便在最后一刻避免唐纳德-特朗普总统征收全面关税。【原文：South Korean and US trade officials have discussed extending the July 9 deadline for trade deals in a last-minute bid to avert sweeping tariffs from President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 与纳西姆-塔勒布和查理-麦克利戈特一起吃牛排
item.description:
怎样才能吃上一顿好饭？【原文：

What makes for a good meal?

】

item.title: 奇货可居：与塔勒布和麦克利戈特一起吃牛排（播客）
item.description: 作家纳西姆-尼古拉斯-塔勒布（Nassim Nicholas Taleb）和野村（Nomura）策略师查理-麦克利戈特（Charlie McElligott）因其对交易、风险和不确定性等问题的观点而闻名。但他们对食物也有非常强烈的看法！例如，纳西姆经常谈论墨鱼汁意大利面，而查理则是众所周知的肉食爱好者。因此，我们想邀请他们吃一顿特别的饭，这顿饭将在我们最近在纽约举办的活动中现场录制。这是一集订户专享的特别节目，我们将现场直播他们吃牛排的过程。【原文：Author Nassim Nicholas Taleb and Nomura strategist Charlie McElligott are well-known for their opinions on things like trading, risk and uncertainty. But they also have very strong opinions on food! Nassim famously talks a lot about squid ink pasta, for instance, while Charlie is a well-known meat lover. So we thought we’d invite them to a special meal, one that would be recorded live onstage at our recent event in New York. This is a special subscriber-only bonus episode of our live steak-eatin】

item.title: 经历 90 天的过山车后，特朗普的关税征收日期到来了
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策时好时坏，三个月来一直给世界经济带来不确定性，随着美国总统提出的贸易协议最后期限于周三到来，世界经济即将变得更加明朗。【原文：The world economy, beset with uncertainty for three months over Donald Trump’s on-again-off-again tariffs, is about to get more clarity as the US president’s deadline for trade deals arrives on Wednesday.】

item.title: 银行正在回避的证券：信贷周刊
item.description: 在少数仍在出售优先股的公司中，美国银行正在效仿摩根大通公司，退出优先股市场，尽管投资者正热衷于购买优先股。【原文：US banks, among the few companies that still sell preferred shares, are following JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s lead and retreating from the securities, even as investors are eager to buy them.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司寻求中国公司帮助重振造船业
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司首席执行官玛格达-尚布里亚特（Magda Chambriard）表示，巴西石油生产商正在寻求中国投资，以帮助其升级航运和基础设施。【原文：Petrobras Chief Executive Officer Magda Chambriard said the Brazilian oil producer is seeking Chinese investment to help upgrade its shipping and infrastructure.】

item.title: 美国特勤局扩大全球打击加密货币诈骗的力度
item.description: 骗局始于一条信息，然后是友好的交流。一个陌生人将受害者引向一个加密货币投资网站，该网站看起来很专业，有华丽的设计、图表，甚至还有客户支持。第一笔存款显示略有盈利。下一笔也是如此。受害者受到鼓舞，存入了更多资金，甚至借钱来维持。然后，在毫无征兆的情况下，平台停止了响应。账户余额消失了。【原文：The scam began with a message, then a friendly exchange. A stranger directed the victim to a cryptocurrency investment site that appeared professional — slick design, charts, even customer support. The first deposit showed a modest profit. So did the next. Encouraged, the victim sent more, even borrowing money to keep up. Then, without warning, the platform stopped responding. The account balance disappeared.】

item.title: 法国敦促设置关税壁垒阻止中国扼杀工业发展
item.description: 法国财政部长埃里克-隆巴德（Eric Lombard）表示，欧洲必须加强关税壁垒，以应对可能损害欧洲大陆工业经济的中国进口产品。【原文：French Finance Minister Eric Lombard said Europe must shore up its tariff barriers to counter Chinese imports that risk harming the continent’s industrial economy.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司考虑因油价下跌出售陆上油田群
item.description: 巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）首席执行官 Magda Chambriard 表示，该公司正在考虑出售其在巴西东北部巴伊亚州的陆上业务。【原文：Petroleo Brasileiro SA is considering the sale of its onshore operations in Brazil’s northeastern Bahia state, Chief Executive Officer Magda Chambriard said.】

item.title: 据国家广播公司报道，加蓬领导人宣布成立政党
item.description: 据加蓬 24 频道报道，加蓬领导人布里斯-奥利吉-恩圭马（Brice Oligui Nguema）正式宣布成立一个新政党，这个欧佩克产油国正在为议会和地方政府选举做准备。【原文：Gabon’s leader Brice Oligui Nguema officially unveiled a new political party as the oil-producing OPEC member prepares for parliamentary and local government elections, Gabon 24 reported.】

item.title: 日本最高贸易谈判代表与卢特尼克举行两次电话会议
item.description: 在 7 月 9 日提高关税的最后期限临近之际，日本首席贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世与美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克举行了两次电话会议，讨论关税问题。【原文：Japan’s chief trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa held two phone meetings with US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick to discuss tariffs as a July 9 deadline for higher levies nears.】

item.title: 被控为埃德加进行数据交易的朋友面临日益扩大的调查
item.description: 当联邦调查局的特工们得知有两名作为内幕交易调查重点的男子即将搭乘飞往香港的航班时，他们不得不迅速采取行动。【原文：The FBI had to move fast when agents learned that two men who were the focus on an insider trading investigation were about to get on a flight to Hong Kong.】

item.title: 欧洲央行马克洛夫称欧元尚未准备好挑战美元的地位
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）说，欧元不可能迅速取代美元成为世界金融体系的支柱，因为使用欧元的国家在金融和经济一体化方面还有很长的路要走。【原文：The euro cannot quickly supplant the dollar as the anchor of the world’s financial system as countries using it still have far to go in their financial and economic integration, European Central Bank Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯将小麦出口税降至零以促进销售
item.description: 俄罗斯自 2021 年 6 月开始征收小麦周出口税以来，首次将其关税降至零，以试图重振低迷的销售。【原文：Russia lowered its weekly wheat export duty to zero for the first time since it was introduced in June 2021 as it attempts to kick-start sluggish sales.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：美国就业数据缓解美联储压力
item.description: 新的美国就业数据减轻了美联储在本月晚些时候考虑降息的压力，很可能使央行至少在秋季之前按兵不动。【原文：Fresh US jobs figures took pressure off the Federal Reserve to consider an interest-rate cut later this month, likely leaving the central bank on hold at least until the fall.】

item.title: 人工智能需求强劲，英伟达合作伙伴鸿海达到预期销售额
item.description: 鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. reported 15.8% growth in quarterly sales on robust demand for AI servers and iPhones.】

item.description:
当今年轻人对金钱的真实看法。【原文：

What today's young people actually think about money.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：艾米丽-桑德伯格谈 Z 世代的理财之道（播客）
item.description: 纽约市的年轻专业人士对金钱和资本主义究竟怎么看？根据我们的嘉宾、"喂我 "通讯的创办人艾米丽-桑德伯格（Emily Sundberg）的说法，他们有一种不祥的预感：没有人会来拯救他们。末世即将来临。人工智能将抢走所有工作。确保安全的时间有限。在今年 6 月于纽约录制的这期直播节目中，艾米莉谈到了这种感觉如何转化为当代年轻人的消费和投资决策，以及他们如何看待未来的世界。【原文：What do young professionals in New York City actually think about money and capitalism? According to our guest Emily Sundberg, creator of the Feed Me newsletter, there is a foreboding sense that nobody is coming to save them. End times are coming. AI will take all the jobs. There’s a limited time to “secure the bag.” In this live episode, recorded in New York City in June, Emily talks about how this translates into consumption and investing decisions among today’s youth, and how they see the wor】

item.title: 欧佩克+原则上同意高于预期的涨幅
item.description: 与会代表表示，欧佩克+原则上同意在下个月进一步加快增加供应量，因为以沙特阿拉伯为首的欧佩克集团正努力夺回市场份额。【原文：OPEC+ has agreed in principle to further accelerate its supply increases next month, delegates said, as the group led by Saudi Arabia seeks to reclaim market share.】

item.title: 黄油全球价格飙升，牛角面包和厨房都深受其害
item.description: 在巴黎第九区和第十区的马米奇面包店，著名的巧克力蛋糕和牛角包都离不开一种不可或缺但却日益稀缺的原料--黄油。【原文：At the Mamiche bakeries in the 9th and 10th arrondissements of Paris, their famous pains au chocolat and croissants depend on an essential but increasingly scarce ingredient — butter.】

item.title: 莫桑比克总统表示考虑要求中国重组债务
item.description: 莫桑比克总统丹尼尔-查波（Daniel Chapo）表示，资金短缺的莫桑比克愿意请求中国重组其欠最大双边债权人的 14 亿美元债务。【原文：Cash-strapped Mozambique is open to asking China to restructure the $1.4 billion it owes its biggest bilateral creditor, President Daniel Chapo said.】

item.title: 墨西哥将分拆受干预银行 CIBanco 和 Intercam 的信托基金
item.description: 墨西哥财政部表示，在美国指控两家银行涉嫌为非法贩毒所得洗钱后，该部将分拆其中两家银行的信托业务。【原文：The Mexican Finance Ministry said it will spin off the trust businesses of two of the banks that it has intervened following US accusations that they are allegedly laundering proceeds from illicit drug trafficking.】

item.title: 买家竞相抵制特朗普关税，越南经济增长迅猛
item.description: 越南第二季度的增长速度加快，因为外国买家竞相避免对美国销售征收高达 46% 的关税的威胁。【原文：Vietnam’s growth accelerated in the second quarter as foreign buyers raced to avoid threatened tariffs of as much as 46% on sales to the US.】

item.title: 美国集团负责人称，越南因特朗普提前达成协议而获得优势
item.description: 美国-东盟商务理事会（US-Asean Business Council）主席泰德-奥西乌斯（Ted Osius）认为，越南争先恐后地与特朗普政府达成贸易协议，即使细节尚不明确，也使这个东南亚国家比地区竞争对手更具优势。【原文：Vietnam’s race to secure a trade deal with the Trump administration, even if the details aren’t clear, gives the Southeast Asian country an advantage over regional rivals, according to Ted Osius, president of the US-Asean Business Council.】

item.title: 韩国在关税截止日期前通过扩大的额外预算案
item.description: 韩国议会批准了 31.8 万亿韩元（约合 233 亿美元）的额外预算，新任总统李在明正在努力重振因消费疲软和美国关税带来的贸易风险而举步维艰的经济。【原文：South Korea’s parliament approved a 31.8 trillion won ($23.3 billion) extra budget as new President Lee Jae Myung seeks to revive an economy struggling with weak consumption and mounting trade risks from US tariffs.】

item.title: 美国大使称与加拿大达成 "双赢 "贸易协议指日可待
item.description: 美国驻加拿大大使对两国之间的贸易谈判给予了乐观的评价，认为唐纳德-特朗普和马克-卡尼之间的谈判将很快达成一项公平的协议。【原文：The US ambassador to Canada gave an optimistic assessment of trade talks between the countries, playing up the odds that a fair deal will emerge soon from negotiations between Donald Trump and Mark Carney.】

item.title: 泰晤士报》称，里夫斯告诉内阁下一次增税将面临挑战
item.description: 据《泰晤士报》报道，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）告诉内阁大臣们，工党政府秋季预算中的增税措施可能比她去年提出的400亿英镑（550亿美元）方案更具挑战性。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves told cabinet ministers that tax increases in the Labour government’s fall budget are likely to be even more challenging than a £40 billion ($55 billion) ­package she put in place last year, the Times reported.】
